controller module¶

class controller.Controller(parent=None)¶

Bases: PySide.QtGui.QWidget

Controller part of the MVC pattern

__init__(parent=None)¶

Initializes the form (view), model and some other variables.

Parameters:parent – the parent
clear_grid()¶

Removes all widgets of the gridlayout

Returns:None
game_button_clicked()¶

Checks if the clicked button was clicked in the correct order and manipulates the GUI (disabling buttons or changing label text)

Returns:None
reset()¶

(Re)sets all values in the model

Returns:None
set_up()¶

Sets up the user interface buttons, labels, events, etc.

Returns:None

update_values()¶

Sets the text of the _value_labels with the values of the model

Returns:None
